title: Kristian Haggerty's Sister Left the Shadiest Comment on Demi Burnett's Instagram
text:
View photos Photo credit: Instagram More

From Cosmopolitan

Kristian Haggerty's sister left a super shady comment on Bachelor in Paradise star Demi Burnett's recent Instagram photo.

Naturally, fans are convinced Kristian and Demi broke up because of this drama.

Things that wake you up even faster than coffee: Bachelor Nation drama!

So, remember earlier this month when the internet was convinced that Demi Burnett and her fiancée Kristian Haggerty had broken up thanks to Demi not posting about her since September 19? Well, Demi shut down the rumors while chatting with Us Weekly, but! There's an update. And said update is some major shade in the comments section of Demi's latest Instagram post.

First of all, this is the Instagram in question:

And according the eagle-eyed sleuths at Bachelor fan 'gram @its_thesnatchelor, Kristian's sister Caitlin hopped into Demi's comments with the following highly shady musing which appears to have since been deleted:

Here's I'll save you the swipe:

View photos Photo credit: Instagram More

For what it's worth, Demi and Kristian still follow each other on Instagram, and it was only a few weeks ago that Demi said the following to Us Weekly:

“Every relationship is different and it’s like—I mean in the most respectful way—it’s nobody’s business how our relationship works....She’s in Florida, I’m in New York, but we do spend time together. Just because we don’t broadcast it doesn’t mean that we’re not together.”

In other words: I'm just as confused as ever, bye!
